company_info.name: Aven
company_info.description: A credit card backed by home equity (HELOC)

key_features.card_type: Home Equity Line of Credit accessed through a credit card
key_features.cashback: 2% on eligible purchases when autopay is enabled
key_features.cash_outs: Transfer cash directly to bank account
key_features.balance_transfers: Transfer from high interest credit cards
key_features.rate_type: Variable rate based on Prime Rate or Federal Funds Target Rate
key_features.fees: No application fees, annual fees, or account closing fees

trending_questions: How does Aven determine the credit line size and interest rate?
Does Aven offer a fixed rate?
Is Aven a credit card or a home equity line of credit?
detailed_content: Comprehensive FAQ content covering eligibility criteria, payment calculations, interest rates, application process, account management, and debt protection options...
